text.cosmicprisonsmod.server_not_allowed: Companion blocked: serverId '%s' is not in allowedServerIds
text.cosmicprisonsmod.settings.title: Cosmic Prisons Mod Settings
text.cosmicprisonsmod.settings.subtitle: Feature cards let you toggle and inspect each module.
text.cosmicprisonsmod.settings.popup.hin: ESC or click outside to close
text.cosmicprisonsmod.feature.peaceful_m: Lets you mine blocks through marked players and entities while keeping normal target safety.
Player or guard blocks your vein.
Hold attack to mine the block behind them.
text.cosmicprisonsmod.feature.inventory_: Shows Cosmic Energy and Money Note values on items without hovering.
text.cosmicprisonsmod.feature.hud_cooldo: Shows only active cooldowns and hides inactive timers automatically.
text.cosmicprisonsmod.feature.hud_events: Displays selected event timers sorted from closest to furthest.
[CAP] Next Level Cap Day Unlock: Max Day
text.cosmicprisonsmod.feature.hud_satche: Shows satchel totals by ore type so you can track capacity while mining.
text.cosmicprisonsmod.feature.pings.name: Pings
text.cosmicprisonsmod.feature.pings.desc: Use Gang and Truce ping keybinds to broadcast your location and show a moving beacon to your team.
text.cosmicprisonsmod.feature.pings.exam: Gang Ping (%s): sends coords + facing to gang chat.
Truce Ping (%s): sends coords + facing to truce chat.
text.cosmicprisonsmod.hud.events.title: Events
text.cosmicprisonsmod.hud.satchels.title: Satchel Display
text.cosmicprisonsmod.hud.editor.title: HUD Layout Editor
text.cosmicprisonsmod.hud.editor.subtitl: Drag each widget to reposition it. Layout saves automatically.
text.cosmicprisonsmod.events_filter.subt: Choose which event lines appear in the Events HUD.
text.cosmicprisonsmod.ping_keys.title: Ping Keybind Settings
text.cosmicprisonsmod.ping_keys.subtitle: Set separate keys for Gang Ping and Truce Ping.
text.cosmicprisonsmod.ping_keys.capture_: Click a key button, then press any key. ESC cancels capture.
